short_summary: Recruitment Modernization Program Management and Transformation Support
description: Provides Business Consultants, Analysts, Project Managers, and Business Transformation Subject Matter Experts
full_summary:
# IT Professional Services

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-6284-13206515
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-240365
* **Publication Date**: June 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

## IT Service Description

The aim of this IT professional services contract is to provide recruitment modernization program management and transformation support. Work will include modernizing business processes, IT, and policies to support change. Technical services will be provided under the following categories:
* Business Consultants
* Analysts
* Project Managers
* Business Transformation Subject Matter Experts

## Selection Criteria

The successful bidder will be selected based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is open to suppliers who are certified as qualifying under one or more of the following international trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
